modShortDescription: This mod causes less grass to be generated in forest and snow. If you want much less grass edit "0.04" in the biomes.xml file to "0.001".
modDescription:
This mod causes less grass to be generated in forest and snow. If you want much less grass edit “0.04” in the biomes.xml file to “0.001”.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/f9v9wc3xq48fgr9/GK_Less_Grass.rar/file)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20168-gouki%C2%B4s-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Gouki](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gouki/)
